title: The International 2025 Grand Champions

summary: [img]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/3703047/4ba13ce440c2d97294b14560cfcf46a3f1b113be.png[/img]Congratulations to Team Falcons, Grand Champions at The International 2025.
